sentences.en: A workmate says to Dave: " Are you all right, Dave? "
sentences.cn: 一位同事问他: “ 你好吗, 戴夫? ”

sentences.en: B : I went out for drinks with my workmate Susan.
sentences.cn: 我和同事苏珊一起出去喝了几杯.

sentences.en: More than 80% of unfaithful people have affairs with someone who’d started out as “just a friend, ” very often a workmate.
sentences.cn: 超过80%的有过偷情史的人都是从跟一些人以“仅仅是朋友”开始的，并且多数是同事。

sentences.en: My English workmate likes drinking coffee.
The link between a positive workmate relationship and the risk of mortality was most notable among those aged between 38 and 43.
sentences.cn: 与同事建立积极关系和死亡风险之间的联系在38到43岁人群当中最为显著。

sentences.en: The report found more than a fifth of employees have recently confided in a colleague, while a similar number said they would turn to a workmate first.
sentences.cn: 研究报告指出，超过五分之一的员工最近曾向一位同事倾吐秘密，另外有同样数量的人说他们会最先向同事倾诉。

sentences.en: We are not only good workmate but also good friends!
sentences.cn: 我们不仅仅是好同事也是好朋友!

sentences.en: Workmate 2 : That's what I'm trying to tell you.
sentences.cn: 工友 2: 这就是我要告诉你的.

sentences.en: Workmate 2 : When's the last time you were out there?
sentences.cn: 工龙 2: 你最后一次呆在单身世界是什么时候?

sentences.en: Workmate 2, 3: We redo all the cabinets.
sentences.cn: 工友2 、: 我们要重做所有的格子.

sentences.en: Workmate 2,3 : We redo all the cabinets.
sentences.cn: 工友2、 3: 我们要重做所有的格子.

sentences.en: Workmate 2: That decorator on the Bennett job.
sentences.cn: 工友2那位班特家的装璜师怎么样.

sentences.en: You'll see. I'd like to propose a toast to our new workmate.
sentences.cn: 你马上会明白. 我想要大家为我们的新工友敬一杯酒.

words.tran_cn: 同事，工友；一起工作的人

trans.tran_cn: 一起工作的人，同事，工友
